data.name: Galerie des voleurs
entries: A handful of characters from the film {@i Donjons et Dragons : L'honneur parmi les voleurs} are presented here as NPCs you can include in your D&D campaigns. The stat blocks in this collection use a similar layout to that found in the movie {@book Monster Manual|MM}. If you're unfamiliar with the format of stat blocks, read the introduction to the Monster Manual before proceeding. This book explains stat block terminology and gives rules for various monster traits - information not repeated here.

entries.title: A collection of heroes and villains for the world's greatest roleplaying game

entries.name: Attaques inhabituelles et magie
entries: Some creatures have weapons that inflict unusual damage and spells that work in atypical ways. For example, {@creature Forge Fitzwilliam|TG} inflicts extra poison damage with his heavy crossbow. This extra damage is not a feature of the weapon. Such an exception is a special feature of a stat block and represents the way the creature uses its weapon or casts its spells; the exception has no effect on the way a weapon or spell works for a different creature.
